lead_paragraph: World Cup winner Diego Maradona has called on compatriot Lionel Messi not to abandon international football after the Argentina captain announced he was quitting the national side following Sunday's Copa America final defeat.

headline.print_headline: Maradona Urges Messi to Shelve Plans to Quit Argentina
headline.main: Maradona Urges Messi to Shelve Plans to Quit Argentina

snippet: World Cup winner Diego Maradona has called on compatriot Lionel Messi not to abandon international football after the Argentina captain announced he was quitting the national side following Sunday's Copa America final defeat....
